name: jobcan
title: Jobcan
description: Japanese attendance management made easy straight from Raycast
author: clins1994

preferences.name: autoReloginOnRefreshFailure
preferences.title: Auto Re-login
preferences.label: Automatically re-login when session expires
preferences.description: When enabled, the extension will automatically attempt to re-login using your stored credentials if the session expires or fails

preferences.name: hideHolidays
preferences.title: Hide Holidays
preferences.label: Hide holiday entries in the attendance list
preferences.description: When enabled, holiday entries will be hidden from the attendance list

preferences.name: useGridsOverLists
preferences.title: Use Grids Over Lists
preferences.label: Use grid layout instead of list layout
preferences.description: When enabled, attendance records will be displayed in a grid layout

preferences.name: gridColumns
preferences.title: Grid Columns
preferences.description: Number of columns in grid view (more columns = smaller items)

preferences.name: attendancePeriodFilter
preferences.title: Default Attendance Period
preferences.description: Default period filter for attendance records

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
